name: contained (Xybit)
description:
Contained is a single-player short horror game, where you are isolated in a small bunker and have to perform tasks to survive.

Controls:

Movement: W A S D

Interact: E

How to play:

At the end of each day, you must scratch a tally mark into the wall next to the shelf

Day 1:  Stock the cans

Day 2: Investigate the noise

Day 28: Fix the breaker
